resources.string: I am java developer with 5 years of experience in developing software applications, I am backend developer and have experience with technologies like java, spring, springboot, and different database designs
Address: 600 south MacArthur blvd apt 328 Coppell Texas 75019

Key skills and Experience: Bachelor\'s Degree in Electronics and Telecommunication, 4 years of experience in developing, deploying, and maintaining business-critical enterprise software as key member of elite technical teams. Highly versatile; constantly developing expertise in new and emerging technologies. Hands-on experience in software development and testing using Java

Accomplished software engineer with more than 6 years of overall IT industry experience, including 4 years of experience in developing, deploying, and maintaining business-critical enterprise software as key member of elite technical teams. Highly versatile; constantly developing expertise in new and emerging technologies. Hands-on experience in software development and testing using Java. Adaptable team player with talent for collaboration and communication with diverse technical and cross-functional teams and interested in learning new technologies.

Languages: Java 8,7,6,1.5 Web: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Servlets, JSP Web Services: REST, Microservices Web and Application Servers: Apache Tomcat Frameworks: Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Mockito Databases: Cosmos Db, SQL Server MS, MySQL, MongoDB Design Patterns: Singleton, Factory Method, Prototype Tools: Eclipse, Intellij, Visual Studio code, Maven, Git, StarUml, Postman, swagger, scenebuilder, Spring Tool Suite (STS), Docker, kubernetes, Kafka, Jenkins, RabbitMQ, AtiveMQ Platforms: Windows, Apple SDLC: Agile, Scrum
Software Engineer in Bank of Kigali, 2014 - 2020

• Working in driver performance team as backend Developer • Worked on different projects for Walmart and currently I am working on new project called proposition 22 which will help in paying California drivers amount which is above minimum wage of CA zones they worked in • I use core Java, J2EE in Spring Boot, ORM frameworks like Hibernate, Cosmos db, meghacache, kafka, as technologies in my tasks and write unit test cases using Junit and Mockito • Used postman to test Api endpoints and to upload the pricing templates, Swagger • Experience in CI/CD using GitHub, Looper (Walmart CI tool which built on top of Jenkins), SonarQube and Contributing to all phases of the software development lifecycle
• Technologies Used: IntelliJ, Eclipse, Vs code, MySQL, Java, HTML5, CSS3, Spring, Spring boot, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Cassandra, postman, swagger, Git
